name: BRISE
0:
”Alexa, turn on office air purifier.”
”Alexa, turn off office air purifier.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill is in order to control BRISE device with voice. If you have a BRISE device, and a BRISE app. Then, you can add a voice control function with this skill.
First, sign up and add device in your BRISE app. Then, in Alexa app, enable this skill and login with the account, which was created in BRISE app.
If your device is named "office", then you can use following commands to control it.
1. Alexa, turn on office air purifier.
2. Alexa, turn off office air purifier.
